title: Swap a BL350 for a BL350?
author: Marslife

posts.post_title: Swap a BL350 for a BL350?
posts.post_content:
Hey Fellas!  I know, long shot, but I would like to swap my Frank Arellanes BL350 for any of the following BL350's: Maddox; Miller; Phillippe; or Wilson.

back must be as clean as it will be displayed in my back set, front condition does not matter.

thanks!  Cliff

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=561914&d=1678553541[/IMG]
